Name: Peace Be Upon Her Land
Text: Persistence, 1 (This card is not destroyed after activation. When this card is revealed, it gains 1 Persist counter(s). In the end phase of your turn, remove 1 Persist counter from this card or destroy it.) While this card is revealed in play, all damage dealt on an opponent's turn is prevented and attached fortifications gain "damage dealt to this fortification cannot be prevented". If this card is attached to a Defenseless fortification, destroy it.
